|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== FCC ID may be H8NWLC3110
The information is per the [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/b43/devices Linux Wireless wiki] (from gsimmons).
==Links of Interest== [http://www.linuxforums.org/forum/wireless-internet/160164-belkin-wifi-laptop-card.html May also apply to v1212]
